description: Louisville received a handful of recruiting sanctions, a $5,000 fine and will be on probation for two years, but its former coach Rick Pitino received no penalties.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:description: An N.C.A.A. panel found that Rick Pitino was guilty only of creating too strict a culture of compliance at Louisville. He has coached at Iona since 2020.
